<Text: Press TV controversies:  The station has been criticised for its uncritical embrace of provocative stances.>

<Text: Press TV controversies:  For British journalist Nick Cohen the station is "a platform for the full fascist conspiracy theory of supernatural Jewish power" and for commentator Douglas Murray it is the "Iranian government’s propaganda channel".>
